ResearchProjectDef.label: golden throne
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the golden throne, the ancient Eldar artifact capable of connecting a psyker to their Webway.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->studied old fragments of Eldari artifacts
subject_story->worked with the Imperium to excavate the original Golden Throne
subject_story->worked on the service worship force polishing and maintaining the Golden Throne
